name: Siddhalepa Balm
description: Siddhalepa Balm is a herbal formulation based on Ayurveda pharmacopoeia chronicled over 4000 years ago (2000 BC). The balm was researched and developed 60 years ago and introduced to traditional Ayurveda physicians for clinical trials in 1932. The balm was introduced to the market in 1934. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
